title: Repair Change Location navigation and state reset

requirements.summary: Ensure the "Change Location" button clears the previously selected place and returns the user to the location search UI so a new place can be selected.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing a selected location's weather, clicking the "Change Location" button navigates back to the Location Search UI.
After clicking "Change Location", the previous location is no longer treated as selected (the WeatherPanel is not rendered until a new place is chosen).
A user can successfully select a new search result and see the weather update for the newly selected location.

file_operations.description: Update the "Change Location" flow by clearing selectedPlace before showing the search UI (e.g., in the onNewSearch handler). Ensure the render conditions prioritize showing LocationSearch only when no place is selected, so WeatherPanel is not rendered after clicking "Change Location" until a new place is chosen.
